statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(basename "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"); branch=$(cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); ctx="${pct}%"; else ctx='0%'; fi; version=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.version'); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf '%s | %s | %s | v%s' "$dir" "$branch" "$ctx" "$version"; else printf '%s | %s | v%s' "$dir" "$ctx" "$version"; fi
